select rn, inq_no, inq_type, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, inq_resp, mem_no from (select /*+ INDEX(b inq_date) */ rownum rn, b.* from inquiries b
where rownum <= (#{page} * 5))a
where a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5
select inq_no, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, mem_no from inquiries where inq_no = #{inqNo}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiries(inq_no, inq_type, inq_title, inq_content, inq_date, inq_resp, mem_no) values (inq_seq.nextval, #{inqType}, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, sysdate, null, #{memNo})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rn, b.* from (select d.ord_no, p.prod_name, d.ord_date, o.list_quant, d.ord_price, d.ord_total, d.ord_stat, o.list_no, d.mem_no, p.prod_no from products p JOIN orderlists o on (o.prod_no = p.prod_no) JOIN orders d on (o.ord_no = d.ord_no)) b
where rownum <= (#{opage} * 5))a
where a.rn > (#{opage} - 1) * 5 order by ord_date desc
select mem_no, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_mail, mem_addr, mem_point from members where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_pw = #{memPw}
mapper.update: update members set mem_name = #{memName}, mem_pw = #{memPw}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, mem_mail = #{memMail}, mem_addr = #{memAddr} where mem_no = #{memNo}
mapper.insert: insert into reviews (rev_no, rev_star, rev_content, rev_date, prod_no, mem_no, list_no) values (rev_seq.nextval, #{revStar}, #{revContent}, sysdate, #{prodNo}, #{memNo}, #{listNo})
mapper.select: select d.ord_no, p.prod_name, d.ord_date, o.list_quant, d.ord_price, d.ord_total, d.ord_stat, o.list_no, d.mem_no, p.prod_no from products p JOIN orderlists o on (o.prod_no = p.prod_no) JOIN orders d on (o.ord_no = d.ord_no) where o.list_no = #{listNo}
